entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Blowing snow at times early this afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
